TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Lazy`2<T, TMetadata> extends System.Lazy`1<!T>
Public Class Lazy(Of T, TMetadata) Inherits Lazy(Of T)
generic <typename T, typename TMetadata> public ref class Lazy : Lazy<T>

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: Tipo di oggetto a cui si fa riferimento.

span.span: The type of the object referenced.
The type of the metadata.

summary.span: Fornisce un riferimento indiretto differito a un oggetto e ai relativi metadati associati per l'uso da parte di Managed Extensibility Framework.

span.span: Provides a lazy indirect reference to an object and its associated metadata for use by the Managed Extensibility Framework.
